title: Best of the best
body: Discuss your best moment hear or add links on your gameplay. Plat 3 smurf. My best was when i was 4v5 to get to plat 4  and we got aced and pushed

replies.body: we were like 50-0 (us on 50) then everyone bought mejais n occult and then we lost.
4v5 The sup had to dc because of Aunty going to hospital and winning my promos
